LinesAnswers.name: hunksInitial
LinesAnswers.line: Boy, what are you doing here, can't you see we have some serious business here? I and the guys are going to Novosibirsk for a training camp, future champions. Everything was fine until the treadmill got banged up on the wagon when we were dragging it in. I can't seem to shake my biceps any more, it's no good. The only good thing is the breeze, or we would have been completely exhausted on the trip.

LinesAnswers.name: plumberGood
LinesAnswers.line: Boy, what are you doing here, can't you see we have some serious business here? I and the guys are going to Novosibirsk for a training camp, future champions. Everything was fine until the treadmill got banged up on the wagon when we were dragging it in. I can't seem to shake my biceps any more, it's no good. The only good thing is the breeze, or we would have been completely exhausted on the trip.

responses.response: Guys, train hard, your treadmill is working now.

LinesAnswers.name: warn
LinesAnswers.line: And why did you close the window? It's stuffy as hell, the guys are all soapy. Get out of here before you get in trouble!

LinesAnswers.name: defeat
LinesAnswers.line: Don't you have a job to do?! Hey, fellas, let's go kick this —Åowboy's ass!

responses.response: Oh, ouch... Looks like that is it for me.

LinesAnswers.name: victory
LinesAnswers.line: You turned out to be a nice guy, kudos to you, and we'll put the treadmill on babushka's bed to make it easier for us here. You, if you want, sit down, your company is welcome!
